abilities.name: Drag
abilities.description: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 damage to the first enemy hit, stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds. If Dehaka is stunned or silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

abilities.name: Dark Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 47 damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

heroics.name: Isolation
heroics.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

heroics.name: Adaptation
heroics.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.
